name: Pre-check equipment for damage prior to installation
Valve arrangement installed as per schematic
Air vents installed at all high points
The pipe OD and groove dimensions are within tolerance range as per victaulic specification
The correct coupling has been used for the correct joint i.e flexible or rigid
Visual indicators verified - Positive overlap - Joint Square
Steel is primed (two coats) and weld painted after works are completed (PA10)
Confirm all bolts in the system are Galvanised
